entries.arrived_at_loc: Intercept the incoming TIE ships at this location.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.first_attack: They are almost upon you pilot, our thoughts are with you...
entries.found_loc: We calculated some coordinates to intercept the incoming TIE-Fighters.
entries.mission_complete: Gunboat Captain: < Great job pilot, we are out of here! >
entries.outofrange: Gunboat Captain: < Move back to the Intercept coordinates or they will slip by! >
entries.outofrange_failed: Gunboat Captain: < We are taking heavy damage from TIE Bombers! Perform emergency hyp..sp..e... >
entries.quest_defendpoint_d: Don't let any of the Imperial fighters get past you. Our gunboat need about three minutes to calculate their jump to lightspeed.
entries.quest_location_d: As if the Dathomir system wasn't dangerous enough, several squadrons of TIE's are heading your way! We know we're asking a lot pilot but you have to cover the escape of our gunboat, we need those codes!
entries.quest_reachpoint_d: Our reconnaissance ships tell us that these coordinates will put you right in between the incoming TIE's and our fleeing gunboat.
entries.split_quest_alert: Rebel Command: < Our infiltrators succeded their mission but they have been discovered, you need to help them out! >
entries.title: Dathomir system: Defend the gunboat.
entries.title_d: The Empire has caught up to what's going on and are launching a full scale attack to destroy the gunboat you delivered the codes to. Cover the gunboats escape.
entries.trans_update: Gunboat Captain: < Our nav computer is calculating jump, %DI percent done. >
entries.transmission_received: Gunboat Captain: < Nav computer finished, prepare for jump to lightspeed! >
entries.transmission_start: Gunboat Captain: < We need about three minutes pilot, hang in there! >
